c74object.name: cage.ezsynth~
c74object.description: Provides a quick way to interpret bach.roll or bach.score slot content as curves for an additive synthesizer.

objarg.name: voices
objarg.description: The optional argument sets the maximum number of voices, as for poly~.

method.name: format
method.description:
A format message sends through the third outlet the proper slotinfo information which should be set to the bach.roll or bach.score. Such information formats the slots in the following way: Slot 1 - Function slot - hotkey: A - Amplitude envelope in decibels.
You are also provided with a command, on the hotkey Z, which immediately stops all the notes being played.

method.name: llll
method.description:
An llll in the inlet is expected to contain the messages coming from bach.roll's or bach.score's playout. The content of an amplitude slots is taken into account at play time. The amplitude envelope in decibel must be contained in slot 1 (function slot).
Such configuration can be easily obtained via the format message.

method.name: stop
method.description: A stop message immediately stops all the notes currently being played.

attribute.name: attack
attribute.description: Sets the note attack time in milliseconds. Default is 5ms.

attribute.name: diapason
attribute.description: Sets the reference tuning pitch, i.e. the frequency (in Hertz) of the A above middle C. Default is 440.

attribute.name: linear
attribute.description: Toggles the ability to treat incoming amplitude envelopes as linear amplitude values, instead tha as decibel values (which is the default).

attribute.name: parallel
attribute.description: Toggles the parallel processing of each note, as for poly~.

attribute.name: release
attribute.description: Sets the release time in milliseconds. Default is 20ms.

attribute.name: voices
attribute.description: Sets the maximum number of simultaneous voices.
